backend.models

Class Trade

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.models.Trade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Idable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Trade
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Idable
    Represents a trade between two users
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Trade

        public Trade(java.lang.String firstUserId,
             java.lang.String secondUserId,
             java.util.Date meetingTime,
             java.util.Date secondMeetingTime,
             java.lang.String meetingLocation,
             java.lang.String firstUserOffer,
             java.lang.String secondUserOffer,
             int allowedEdits,
             java.lang.String message)
        Makes a new trade object
        Parameters:
        firstUserId - the user id of the person initializing the trade
        secondUserId - the user id of the person the trade is being sent to
        meetingTime - when the meeting takes place
        secondMeetingTime - when the second meeting takes place
        meetingLocation - where the meeting takes place
        firstUserOffer - the item id that the user who initialized the trade is willing to offer
        secondUserOffer - the item id that the user who got sent the trade is willing to offer
        allowedEdits - number of edits allowed before the trade is cancelled
        message - the message that goes with the trade
